name: Suneel Kumar
headline: Turning ideas into scalable SaaS and AI-powered products.
education: B.Tech in Computer Science, CSJMU Kanpur (Batch of 2024)

positions.title: Software Engineering Intern
bullets: Created responsive onboarding flows in React and Node.js that enhanced user experience.
Built internal dashboards that boosted team productivity by 25%.
Worked closely with senior developers on real-world MERN stack projects.

positions.title: Associate Software Developer
bullets: Developed Task Delegation and Helpdesk systems from the ground up using MERN stack.
Optimized database queries, cutting system response times by 35%.
Integrated AI-powered features for automated task assignments.
Led code reviews and mentored two junior developers to improve overall code quality.

positions.title: Software Developer
bullets: Maintaining and scaling a Learning Management System used by 10,000+ users.
Building AI-driven features using OpenAI API and LangChain to enhance learning experiences.
Implementing microservices architecture with Docker and AWS for better scalability.
Reduced deployment time by 60% by streamlining CI/CD pipelines.

short_bio: Software Engineer with 2+ years of experience building full-stack SaaS and AI-driven products. Skilled in React, Node.js, MongoDB, SQL, and Generative AI. Passionate about delivering scalable, production-ready solutions that create real business impact.
achievements: Delivered 6+ production applications impacting thousands of users.
Improved system performance by 35% through optimization and clean architecture.
Led the development of AI-powered automation features adopted company-wide.
Actively mentored junior developers and participated in technical interviews.
